session_summary: TradingRobotPlug architecture deliverables completion: API specifications (OpenAPI/Swagger), Phase 1 interface validation, coordination updates, git push. All architecture documentation complete and ready for implementation.

tradingrobotplug_api_specifications.description: Created comprehensive API specifications document with OpenAPI 3.0 format (851 lines). Defined all endpoints (Stock Data, Strategies, Trades, Performance), data models, error handling, authentication, rate limiting, pagination, filtering.

tradingrobotplug_phase1_interface_valida.description: Validated Agent-1's Phase 1 interface implementations (6 interfaces: ITradingEngine, IStrategyManager, IMarketDataProcessor, IOrderSimulator, ITradeExecutor, IEventPublisher). All interfaces approved with minor cosmetic recommendations.

coordination_messages.description: Sent coordination messages to Agent-1 (integration architecture + component interfaces), Agent-3 (contact page + Build-In-Public Phase 0 deployment approval), Agent-7 (WordPress plugin interfaces).

git_push.description: Pushed Agent_Cellphone_V2_Repository (Dream.os) to origin/main (4 commits). Websites repository already up-to-date with origin/master.

coordination_document_update.description: Updated TradingRobotPlug coordination document marking all architecture deliverables as complete (Platform Architecture Plan, Integration Architecture Validation, Component Interface Specifications, API Specifications).

tradingrobotplug_implementation_monitori.description: Monitoring TradingRobotPlug Phase 1 implementation progress. All architecture deliverables complete, ready for Agent-1 and Agent-7 implementation work.

post_deployment_validation.description: Post-deployment validation checklists prepared. Standing by for Agent-3 deployment completion to begin validation.

progress_metrics.architecture_deliverables_complete: 4 (Platform Architecture Plan, Integration Architecture Validation, Component Interface Specifications, API Specifications)

decisions_made.api_specification_format: OpenAPI 3.0 format chosen for API specifications to enable interactive documentation generation and client code generation
decisions_made.interface_validation_approach: Validated interfaces against component interface specifications, approved enhanced functionality that appropriately extends base spec
decisions_made.coordination_strategy: Proactive coordination messages sent to inform agents of completed architecture work and next steps

tradeoffs.api_specification_detail: Comprehensive OpenAPI spec created (851 lines) vs. minimal spec - chose comprehensive for implementation clarity
tradeoffs.interface_validation_scope: Validated all 6 core interfaces vs. subset - chose complete validation for architecture compliance

blockers: None - All architecture deliverables complete, monitoring implementation progress
